name: Swinger v0.1.5
description:
Swinger v0.1.5

Available on Windows or Mac

Simple pixel-style minimal game I started making out of boredom, use your mouse to swing your flail and attack enemies, swinging fast will set the flail on fire. Game still in development, expect frequent updates :D

Game is on Windowed Fullscreen 1920 x 1080 for the moment, Changing resolution will be added later.
